full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**

**Building Housekeeping and Cleaning Services, Chambly Canal and Lachine Canal National Historic Sites**

**Solicitation Number:** 5P300-23-0243/A

**Posting Date:** January 24, 2024

**Tender Closing Date:** February 20, 2024, at 2:00 PM EST

**Contract Description:**

Parks Canada is seeking a contract to provide building housekeeping and cleaning services at the Chambly Canal and Lachine Canal National Historic Sites. The successful bidder will be responsible for maintaining the cleanliness and organization of the buildings in accordance with this solicitation. The contract period will commence on April 1, 2024, and will continue until March 31, 2026, with two additional optional one-year periods.

**Key Requirements:**

* Provide cleaning services for all buildings and facilities at the Chambly Canal and Lachine Canal National Historic Sites
* Maintain a high level of cleanliness and organization throughout the buildings and facilities
* Comply with all relevant laws, regulations, and guidelines related to park operations
* Ensure the security of all personnel and facilities on-site
* Complete all work in a timely and professional manner

**Important Information:**

* Bids will be accepted by email or fax only. Please submit your bid to [soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca](mailto:soumissionsest-bidseast@pc.gc.ca) or 1-877-558-2349.
* The maximum email file size that Parks Canada can receive is 15 megabytes. Please ensure that your bid is not exceeded, as this may result in the rejection of your submission.
* Bidders are responsible for ensuring that their bid is complete and accurate, and that all necessary documentation is included.
* Parks Canada is not accepting bids via SAP Ariba. Please submit your bid by email or fax as indicated.

**Security Requirements:**

* All bidders must have a valid personnel security clearance. New bids will require fingerprints to initiate the criminal record check.

**Contract Scope:**

The contract will cover a period of two years, with two additional optional one-year periods. The contractor will be responsible for providing cleaning services on a full-time basis and ensuring that all work is completed in a timely and professional manner.

**Contact Information:**

For further information or clarification, please contact Jillian King, Contracting Authority, at [jillian.king@pc.gc.ca](mailto:jillian.king@
